description: A description of the confidence a Seller has in delivering services.
title: serviceabilityConfidence

___color.description: A color that indicates confidence. Green = Serviceable, Red = Unserviceable, Yellow = We'll get back to you.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceabilityConfidence.

___reason.description: A description of the reason a particular color is being provided. This may include a specific standard reason codes and descriptions.

___estimatedResponseDate.description: When the color is Yellow (meaning 'We'll get back to you'), this date indicates when the Seller plans to provide a more complete response. The date formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).
